name: W. Kevin Wolff
bio: Kevin is the Founder and Owner of Rentgrab, a technology solutions company based in Ocean City, Maryland. With over 15 years of experience transforming businesses through innovative digital solutions, Kevin brings a unique blend of technical expertise (SharePoint, Power Platform, React), creative vision from his award-winning background as an Art Director, and entrepreneurial insight from founding multiple ventures including Rumble Fish Tackle & Lure. His diverse skill set spans full-stack development, digital marketing strategy, and business consulting, enabling him to bridge the gap between complex technology and tangible business outcomes. Through Rentgrab, Kevin leverages his enterprise-level experience architecting applications for thousands of users to deliver solutions that have saved organizations millions in operational costs.
